Hymn.Arabic: أَنْصِتْ يَا رَبُّ لِكَلِمَاتِي ، وَافْهَمْ صُرَاخِي
Hymn.English: 5:1 Give ear to my words, O Lord, Consider my meditation.

Hymn.Arabic: أَصْغِ إِلَى صَوْتِ طِلْبَتِي ، يَا مَلِكِي وَإِلهِي هَللويا.
Hymn.English: 2 Give heed to the voice of my cry, My King and my God, For to You I will pray.     Alleluia
